name: Dr. Priya Sharma
title: Robotics & AI Expert
bio: 15+ years of experience in robotics research and product development. Former CTO at leading robotics startup.

name: Rajesh Kumar

bio: Expert in embedded systems, hardware design, and manufacturing processes. Helped launch 20+ hardware products.

bio: PhD in Machine Learning. Published 50+ papers. Expert in deep learning, computer vision, and NLP.

bio: Serial entrepreneur with 3 successful exits. Specializes in go-to-market strategy and fundraising.

name: Meera Reddy

bio: Expert in robotics regulations, safety standards, and compliance for hardware products.
